description: DHAVAL BATHIA (B.Com, ACS, LLB) is one of the world’s youngest international bestselling authors. He has written five books that have been translated in over 14 languages. His memory feats have won him several international championships, earning him the accolades ‘Human Computer’, ‘Whiz-Kid’, ‘Memory Champ’ and more.
name: Dhaval Bathia
